It appears that something is wrong with your Mylyn install, because this exception should not be triggered unless one of the Mylyn plug-ins failed to start.  Could you please try to install the latest Mylyn build from the following update site and reopen the bug if you still see this?

http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads/builds.php

In the meantime I have added a safeguard against this failure that will warn the user with a dialog that something is wrong with the Mylyn install.
